name: Neha Singh
quote: Youth participation is not just about voting; it's about volunteering, debating, and holding systems accountable.

name: Arjun Patel
quote: Public transport should be affordable and accessible. Every city deserves clean and safe mobility for all.

name: Sara Khan
quote: We need better civic education in schools — students should learn how budgets and local bodies actually work.

name: Rohit Das
quote: Corruption isn't abstract — it starts when we ignore small wrongs. Awareness campaigns should target schools.

name: Meera George
quote: Digital government services must be inclusive; not everyone has broadband or English literacy.

name: Aakash Sharma
quote: We, the youth, can redefine accountability through data and transparency. Let's build civic tech tools.
